title: Thursday Post Show (03-31-22)
itunes:title: Thursday Post Show (03-31-22)
description:
Bobby reveals the most popular genre of music that people sing in the shower. 1 in 5 people have flipped people off while driving. A robber made a victim ‘pinky promise’ not to report him. We take calls on Eddie’s milkshake incident that he shared on the radio show today. Bobby shares his experience hanging out with Billy Ray Cyrus tomorrow. Amy shares why her son was reading to their cat.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
